verses.verse: וַיִּגַּע֙ <WH5060> was come הַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <WH7637> And when the seventh וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בֶּעָרִ֑ים <WH5892> [were] in the cities ס וַיֵּאָסְפ֥וּ <WH622> gathered themselves together הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> the people כְּאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> man אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> as one אֶל־ <WH413> to יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> to Jerusalem ס

וַיָּקָם֩ <WH6965> Then stood up יֵשׁ֨וּעַ <WH3442> Jeshua בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יֽוֹצָדָ֜ק <WH3136> of Jozadak וְאֶחָ֣יו <WH251> and his brethren הַכֹּהֲנִ֗ים <WH3548> the priests וּזְרֻבָּבֶ֤ל <WH2216> and Zerubbabel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵל֙ <WH7597> of Shealtiel וְאֶחָ֔יו <WH251> and his brethren וַיִּבְנ֕וּ <WH1129> and builded אֶת־ <WH853> מִזְבַּ֖ח <WH4196> the altar אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel לְהַעֲל֤וֹת <WH5927> to offer עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> and עֹל֔וֹת <WH5930> burnt offerings כַּכָּת֕וּב <WH3789> thereon as [it is] written בְּתוֹרַ֖ת <WH8451> in the law מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> of Moses אִישׁ־ <WH376> the man הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

וַיָּכִ֤ינוּ <WH3559> And they set הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH4196> the altar עַל־ <WH5921> on מְכ֣וֹנֹתָ֔יו <WH4350> upon his bases כִּ֚י <WH3588> for בְּאֵימָ֣ה <WH367> for fear עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> of מֵעַמֵּ֖י <WH5971> [was] upon them because of the people הָאֲרָצ֑וֹת <WH776> of those countries [וַיַּעַל כ] (וַיַּעֲל֨וּ <WH5927> arise ק) עָלָ֤יו <WH5921> and עֹלוֹת֙ <WH5930> burnt offerings לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> thereon unto the LORD עֹל֖וֹת <WH5930> [even] burnt offerings לַבֹּ֥קֶר <WH1242> morning וְלָעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> and evening

וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֛וּ <WH6213> They kept אֶת־ <WH853> חַ֥ג <WH2282> also the feast הַסֻּכּ֖וֹת <WH5521> of tabernacles כַּכָּת֑וּב <WH3789> as [it is] written וְעֹלַ֨ת <WH5930> burnt offerings י֤וֹם <WH3117> of every day בְּיוֹם֙ <WH3117> required בְּמִסְפָּ֔ר <WH4557> by number כְּמִשְׁפַּ֖ט <WH4941> according to the custom דְּבַר־ <WH1697> as the duty י֥וֹם <WH3117> day בְּיוֹמֽוֹ׃ <WH3117> day

וְאַחֲרֵיכֵ֞ן <WH310> And afterward עֹלַ֤ת <WH5930> burnt offering תָּמִיד֙ <WH8548> [offered] the continual וְלֶ֣חֳדָשִׁ֔ים <WH2320> both of the new moons וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> and for all מוֹעֲדֵ֥י <WH4150> and of all the set feasts יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD הַמְקֻדָּשִׁ֑ים <WH6942> that were consecrated וּלְכֹ֛ל <WH3605> everyone מִתְנַדֵּ֥ב <WH5068> and of every one that willingly offered נְדָבָ֖ה <WH5071> a freewill offering לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

מִיּ֤וֹם <WH3117> day אֶחָד֙ <WH259> From the first לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <WH7637> of the seventh הֵחֵ֕לּוּ <WH2490> began לְהַעֲל֥וֹת <WH5927> they to offer עֹל֖וֹת <WH5930> burnt offerings לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3069> God וְהֵיכַ֥ל <WH1964> of the temple יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God לֹ֥א <WH3808> but יֻסָּֽד׃ <WH3245> was not [yet] laid

וַיִּ֨תְּנוּ־ <WH5414> They gave כֶ֔סֶף <WH3701> money לַחֹצְבִ֖ים <WH2672> also unto the masons וְלֶחָרָשִׁ֑ים <WH2796> and to the carpenters וּמַאֲכָ֨ל <WH3978> and meat וּמִשְׁתֶּ֜ה <WH4960> and drink וָשֶׁ֗מֶן <WH8081> and oil לַצִּֽדֹנִים֙ <WH6722> unto them of Zidon וְלַצֹּרִ֔ים <WH6876> and to them of Tyre לְהָבִיא֩ <WH935> to bring עֲצֵ֨י <WH6086> trees אֲרָזִ֤ים <WH730> cedar מִן־ <WH4480> from הַלְּבָנוֹן֙ <WH3844> from Lebanon אֶל־ <WH413> to יָ֣ם <WH3220> to the sea יָפ֔וֹא <WH3305> of Joppa כְּרִשְׁי֛וֹן <WH7558> according to the grant כּ֥וֹרֶשׁ <WH3566> that they had of Cyrus מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king פָּרַ֖ס <WH6539> of Persia עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5921> and פ

וּבַשָּׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> year הַשֵּׁנִ֗ית <WH8145> Now in the second לְבוֹאָ֞ם <WH935> of their coming אֶל־ <WH413> to בֵּ֤ית <WH1004> unto the house הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> of God לִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> at Jerusalem בַּחֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַשֵּׁנִ֑י <WH8145> in the second הֵחֵ֡לּוּ <WH2490> began זְרֻבָּבֶ֣ל <WH2216> Zerubbabel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שְׁ֠אַלְתִּיאֵל <WH7597> of Shealtiel וְיֵשׁ֨וּעַ <WH3442> and Jeshua בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יֽוֹצָדָ֜ק <WH3136> of Jozadak וּשְׁאָ֥ר <WH7605> and the remnant אֲחֵיהֶ֣ם ׀ <WH251> of their brethren הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <WH3548> the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֗ם <WH3881> and the Levites וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַבָּאִים֙ <WH935> and all they that were come out מֵהַשְּׁבִ֣י <WH7628> of the captivity יְרֽוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> unto Jerusalem וַיַּעֲמִ֣ידוּ <WH5975> and appointed אֶת־ <WH853> הַלְוִיִּ֗ם <WH3881> the Levites מִבֶּ֨ן <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> from twenty שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years וָמַ֔עְלָה <WH4605> and upward לְנַצֵּ֖חַ <WH5329> to set forward עַל־ <WH5921> and מְלֶ֥אכֶת <WH4399> the work בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD פ

וַיַּעֲמֹ֣ד <WH5975> Then stood יֵשׁ֡וּעַ <WH3442> Jeshua בָּנָ֣יו <WH1121> [with] his sons וְ֠אֶחָיו <WH251> and his brethren קַדְמִיאֵ֨ל <WH6934> Kadmiel וּבָנָ֤יו <WH1121> and his sons בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the sons יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah כְּאֶחָ֔ד <WH259> together לְנַצֵּ֛חַ <WH5329> to set forward עַל־ <WH5921> and עֹשֵׂ֥ה <WH6213> accomplish הַמְּלָאכָ֖ה <WH4399> the workmen בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> in the house הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God ס בְּנֵי֙ <WH1121> the sons חֵֽנָדָ֔ד <WH2582> of Henadad בְּנֵיהֶ֥ם <WH1121> [with] their sons וַאֲחֵיהֶ֖ם <WH251> and their brethren הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <WH3881> the Levites

וְיִסְּד֥וּ <WH3245> laid the foundation הַבֹּנִ֖ים <WH1129> And when the builders אֶת־ <WH853> הֵיכַ֣ל <WH1964> of the temple יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיַּעֲמִידוּ֩ <WH5975> they set הַכֹּהֲנִ֨ים <WH3548> the priests מְלֻבָּשִׁ֜ים <WH3847> in their apparel בַּחֲצֹֽצְר֗וֹת <WH2689> with trumpets וְהַלְוִיִּ֤ם <WH3881> and the Levites בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the sons אָסָף֙ <WH623> of Asaph בַּֽמְצִלְתַּ֔יִם <WH4700> with cymbals לְהַלֵּל֙ <WH1984> to praise אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> according יְדֵ֖י <WH3027> after the ordinance דָּוִ֥יד <WH1732> of David מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַֽ֠יַּעֲנוּ <WH6030> And they sang together by course בְּהַלֵּ֨ל <WH1984> in praising וּבְהוֹדֹ֤ת <WH3034> and giving thanks לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto the LORD כִּ֣י <WH3588> for ט֔וֹב <WH2896> because [he is] good כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for לְעוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּ֖וֹ <WH2617> for his mercy עַל־ <WH5921> because יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> toward Israel וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֡ם <WH5971> And all the people הֵרִיעוּ֩ <WH7321> shouted תְרוּעָ֨ה <WH8643> shout גְדוֹלָ֤ה <WH1419> with a great בְהַלֵּל֙ <WH1984> when they praised לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD עַ֖ל <WH5921> because הוּסַ֥ד <WH3245> was laid בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD ס

וְרַבִּ֡ים <WH7227> But many מֵהַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <WH3548> of the priests וְהַלְוִיִּם֩ <WH3881> and Levites וְרָאשֵׁ֨י <WH7218> and chief הָאָב֜וֹת <WH1> of the fathers הַזְּקֵנִ֗ים <WH2205> [who were] ancient men אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who רָא֜וּ <WH7200> that had seen אֶת־ <WH853> הַבַּ֤יִת <WH1004> house הָֽרִאשׁוֹן֙ <WH7223> the first בְּיָסְד֔וֹ <WH3245> was laid זֶ֤ה <WH2088> of this הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> of this house בְּעֵ֣ינֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5869> before their eyes בֹּכִ֖ים <WH1058> wept בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> voice גָּד֑וֹל <WH1419> with a loud וְרַבִּ֛ים <WH7227> and many בִּתְרוּעָ֥ה <WH8643> shouted בְשִׂמְחָ֖ה <WH8057> for joy לְהָרִ֥ים <WH7311> aloud קֽוֹל׃ <WH6963> voice

וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> that הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> So that the people מַכִּירִים֙ <WH5234> could not discern ק֚וֹל <WH6963> the noise תְּרוּעַ֣ת <WH8643> of the shout הַשִּׂמְחָ֔ה <WH8057> of joy לְק֖וֹל <WH6963> from the noise בְּכִ֣י <WH1065> of the weeping הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> of the people כִּ֣י <WH3588> for הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> for the people מְרִיעִים֙ <WH7321> shouted תְּרוּעָ֣ה <WH8643> shout גְדוֹלָ֔ה <WH1419> with a loud וְהַקּ֥וֹל <WH6963> and the noise נִשְׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> was heard עַד־ <WH5704> against לְמֵרָחֽוֹק׃ <WH7350> afar off פ
